errors.title: Blank Label
errors.description: A label in the header row is missing a value. Label should be provided and not be blank.
errors.message: Label in the header in field at position "3" is blank

errors.title: Duplicate Label
errors.description: Two columns in the header row have the same value. Column names should be unique.
errors.message: Label "name" in the header at position "4" is duplicated to a label: at position "2"
errors.label: name

errors.title: Missing Cell
errors.description: This row has less values compared to the header row (the first row in the data source). A key concept is that all the rows in tabular data must have the same number of columns.
errors.message: Row at position "2" has a missing cell in field "field3" at position "3"

errors.title: Missing Cell
errors.description: This row has less values compared to the header row (the first row in the data source). A key concept is that all the rows in tabular data must have the same number of columns.
errors.message: Row at position "2" has a missing cell in field "name2" at position "4"

errors.title: Missing Cell
errors.description: This row has less values compared to the header row (the first row in the data source). A key concept is that all the rows in tabular data must have the same number of columns.
errors.message: Row at position "3" has a missing cell in field "field3" at position "3"

errors.title: Missing Cell
errors.description: This row has less values compared to the header row (the first row in the data source). A key concept is that all the rows in tabular data must have the same number of columns.
errors.message: Row at position "3" has a missing cell in field "name2" at position "4"

errors.title: Blank Row
errors.description: This row is empty. A row should contain at least one value.
errors.message: Row at position "4" is completely blank

errors.title: Extra Cell
errors.description: This row has more values compared to the header row (the first row in the data source). A key concept is that all the rows in tabular data must have the same number of columns.
errors.message: Row at position "5" has an extra value in field at position "5"
